title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit! This award-winning kit is designed to ignite your child's curiosity and passion for engineering and construction. 

With the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit, your child can build an impressive collection of 20 different models, including bridges and skyscrapers. They will learn about the fundamental concepts of force, load, compression, and tension through hands-on experimentation. 

The kit includes 285 pieces, providing endless possibilities for creativity and problem-solving. From columns and beams to trusses and arches, your child will explore a wide range of structural elements. They will also dive into the world of forces, covering tension, compression, shear, and bending. 

As a Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, you can trust that this kit offers exceptional educational value. It is designed for intermediate skill levels, allowing children to challenge themselves and grow their knowledge and engineering abilities. 

The illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide, spanning over 36 pages, will be their trusted companion throughout the learning journey. It provides step-by-step instructions for each of the 20 model-building experiments, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable experience. 

Not only will your child have a blast constructing these amazing structures, but they will also develop a strong foundation in mechanical physics and structural engineering. They will gain insights into the strength and stability of structures, as well as the strength and stiffness of materials. 

The Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit is the perfect gift for young aspiring engineers and builders. It offers a fun and engaging way to foster creativity, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills. Get ready to watch your child's imagination soar as they construct their very own architectural marvels!

Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit! This award-winning kit is perfect for budding engineers and aspiring architects. With this kit, your child can build an impressive collection of 20 different models, including bridges and skyscrapers.

The kit contains a whopping 285 pieces, providing endless possibilities for creativity and design. The 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide will guide your child through each step of the building process, ensuring a fun and educational experience.

Not only will your child have a blast building these incredible structures, but they will also learn important concepts such as force, load, compression, and tension. The kit covers various structural elements like columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary, allowing your child to explore different design techniques.

The Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit goes beyond just building models. It delves into the world of mechanical physics and structural engineering, teaching your child about the strength and stability of structures, as well as the strength and stiffness of materials. It's the perfect way to introduce your child to the fascinating world of engineering.

This kit has been recognized with the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, a testament to its quality and educational value. And with its beautiful blue color, it's sure to catch your child's eye and ignite their imagination.

Bring out the engineer in your child with the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit. Order now and watch your child's creativity and knowledge soar to new heights!

Explore a variety of structural elements such as columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary structures. This kit is not just about building models, it's about gaining a deep understanding of mechanical physics and structural engineering. With a total of 285 pieces, this kit guarantees hours of engaging and educational fun. So, whether you're a young engineer or an adult enthusiast, the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit is the perfect choice for expanding your knowledge and building incredible structures. Don't miss out on this award-winning kit that combines education with excitement. Get yours today!
